title: 旧约 - 以赛亚书(Isaiah) - 第 25 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 以赛亚书(Isaiah) -- 第 25 章 ( 本篇共有 66 章 )

lineList.en: O Lord, thou art my God; I will exalt thee, I will praise thy name; for thou hast done wonderful things; thy counsels of old are faithfulness and truth.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你是我的神。我要尊崇你，我要称赞你的名。因为你以忠信诚实行过奇妙的事。成就你古时所定的。

lineList.en: For thou hast made of a city an heap; of a defenced city a ruin: a palace of strangers to be no city; it shall never be built.
lineList.cn: 你使城变为乱堆，使坚固城变为荒场，使外邦人宫殿的城，不再为城，永远不再建造。

lineList.en: Therefore shall the strong people glorify thee, the city of the terrible nations shall fear thee.
lineList.cn: 所以刚强的民，必荣耀你。强暴之国的城，必敬畏你。

lineList.en: For thou hast been a strength to the poor, a strength to the needy in his distress, a refuge from the storm, a shadow from the heat, when the blast of the terrible ones is as a storm against the wall.
lineList.cn: 因为当强暴人催逼人的时候，如同暴风直吹墙壁，你就作贫穷人的保障，作困乏人急难中的保障，作躲暴风之处，作避炎热的阴凉。

lineList.en: Thou shalt bring down the noise of strangers, as the heat in a dry place; even the heat with the shadow of a cloud: the branch of the terrible ones shall be brought low.
lineList.cn: 你要压制外邦人的喧哗，好像乾燥地的热气下落，禁止强暴人的凯歌，好像热气被云影消化。

lineList.en: And in this mountain shall the LORD of hosts make unto all people a feast of fat things, a feast of wines on the lees, of fat things full of marrow, of wines on the lees well refined.
lineList.cn: 在这山上万军之耶和华，必为万民用肥甘设摆筵席，用陈酒和满髓的肥甘，并澄清的陈酒，设摆筵席。

lineList.en: And he will destroy in this mountain the face of the covering cast over all people, and the vail that is spread over all nations.
lineList.cn: 他又必在这山上，除灭遮盖万民之物，和遮蔽万国蒙脸的帕子。

lineList.en: He will swallow up death in victory; and the Lord GOD will wipe away tears from off all faces; and the rebuke of his people shall he take away from off all the earth: for the LORD hath spoken it.
lineList.cn: 他已经吞灭死亡直到永远。主耶和华必擦去各人脸上的眼泪，赛25：08B）又除掉普天下他百姓的羞辱。因为这是耶和华说的。

lineList.en: And it shall be said in that day, Lo, this is our God; we have waited for him, and he will save us: this is the LORD; we have waited for him, we will be glad and rejoice in his salvation.
lineList.cn: 到那日人必说，看哪，这是我们的神。我们素来等候他，他必拯救我们，这是耶和华，我们素来等候他，我们必因他的救恩。欢喜快乐。

lineList.en: For in this mountain shall the hand of the LORD rest, and Moab shall be trodden down under him, even as straw is trodden down for the dunghill.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的手，必按在这山上。摩押人在所居之地必被践踏，好像乾草被践踏在粪池的水中。

lineList.en: And he shall spread forth his hands in the midst of them, as he that swimmeth spreadeth forth his hands to swim: and he shall bring down their pride together with the spoils of their hands.
lineList.cn: 他必在其中伸开手，好像？？水的伸开手？？水一样。但耶和华必使他的骄傲，和他手所行的诡计，一并败落。

lineList.en: And the fortress of the high fort of thy walls shall he bring down, lay low, and bring to the ground, even to the dust.
lineList.cn: 耶和华使你城上的坚固高台倾倒，拆平直到尘埃。
